extends java.lang.Enum<DialDrawer.ScaleType>
    The background bitmap scale type

    • 枚举常量概要

      枚举常量 说明

    • 枚举常量详细资料

      • CENTER

        public static final DialDrawer.ScaleType CENTER
        like ImageView.ScaleType.CENTER

      • CENTER_CROP

        public static final DialDrawer.ScaleType CENTER_CROP
        like ImageView.ScaleType.CENTER_CROP

      • AUTO_CROP

        public static final DialDrawer.ScaleType AUTO_CROP
        When the Bitmap is large enough, use the CENTER mode. When the Bitmap is small enough to fill the entire view, use CENTER_CROP
